GLM_FUNC_DECL genType glm::bounceEaseOut (genType const &a)

GLM_FUNC_DECL genType glm::bounceEaseInOut (genType const &a)
Detailed Description
Include <glm/gtx/easing.hpp> to use the features of this extension.
Easing functions for animations and transitons All functions take a parameter x in the range [0.0,1.0]
Based on the AHEasing project of Warren Moore (https://github.com/warrenm/AHEasing)

Modelled after the piecewise circular function y = (1/2)(1 - sqrt(1 - 4x^2)) ; [0, 0.5) y = (1/2)(sqrt(-(2x - 3)*(2x - 1)) + 1) ; [0.5, 1] See also

GLM_FUNC_DECL genType glm::elasticEaseIn (genType const & a)
Modelled after the damped sine wave y = sin(13pi/2*x)*pow(2, 10 * (x - 1)) See also
GLM_GTX_easing
Here is the call graph for this function:
elasticEaseInOut() elasticEaseInOutGLM_GTX_easing GLM_GTX_easingelasticEaseInOut template<typename genType >
GLM_FUNC_DECL genType glm::elasticEaseInOut (genType const & a)
Modelled after the piecewise exponentially-damped sine wave: y = (1/2)*sin(13pi/2*(2*x))*pow(2, 10 * ((2*x) - 1)) ; [0,0.5) y = (1/2)*(sin(-13pi/2*((2x-1)+1))*pow(2,-10(2*x-1)) + 2) ; [0.5, 1] See also
GLM_GTX_easing
